entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
